attributes.action: England to have a referendum to leave the UK & ban free movement of labour x EU
attributes.additional_details:
Refer to the "Leave Campaign" said we could have an Australian style immigration system

Quote from WEBSITE.
We will take back control of migration policy. Migration brings many benefits but we have lost democratic control. This is even more dangerous because there are five more countries in the queue to join. If we Vote Leave, we can introduce a humane and fair points-based system that does not discriminate against people based on the country they live in.  

VERY CLEAR ON WHAT PEOPLE VOTED FOR
attributes.background: In vast area's of ENGLAND we voted on the EU referendum to leave the EU and a lot voted to restrict free movement of people from the EU as it has a major impact on suppressing wages and putting a strain on our services. Yet this seems like part of the democratic result might be ignored - immigration

rejection.details:
If you don't want freedom of movement with the EU, you could sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/154593 

If you want England and Wales to become independent, you could sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/138966
